name: fsl_first
description: FIRST is a model-based segmentation and registration tool, based on a Bayesian model of shape and appearance for subcortical structures.

inputs.name: Method
inputs.description: Method must be one of 'auto' (default), 'fast', 'none', or it can be a numerical threshold value. This specifies the boundary correction method. Auto chooses different options for different structures using the settings that were found to be empirically optimal for each structure. Other options use: fast (using FAST-based, mixture-model, tissue-type classification) or threshold (thresholds a simple single-Gaussian intensity model).

inputs.name: Output name
inputs.description: Output name to use for first

inputs.name: Brain extracted
inputs.description: Whether the input is already brain extracted.

inputs.name: Specify structure
inputs.description: Run only on one specified structure (e.g. L_Hipp) or a comma-separated list (no spaces). Choose from: 'L_Hipp', 'R_Hipp', 'L_Accu', 'R_Accu', 'L_Amyg', 'R_Amyg', 'L_Caud', 'R_Caud', 'L_Pall', 'R_Pall', 'L_Puta', 'R_Puta', 'L_Thal', 'R_Thal', 'BrStem'.

inputs.name: Use Affine Matrix
inputs.description: Use affine matrix (i.e. do not re-run registration).

inputs.name: Three stage registration
inputs.description: Use 3-stage affine registration. Only currently implemented for the hippocampus.
